Application of the General Terms and Conditions These general terms and conditions (General Terms and Conditions) constitute an integral part of the agreement regarding the delivery of the service to the merchant by the supplier. The general Terms and Conditions shall be applied unless the merchant and the Supplier have otherwise agreed in writing. The agreement will enter into force when the parties have signed the agreement or when the supplier has approved the agreement form submitted by the merchant for the service.
PayRow is a B2B fintech player addressing retail and microfinance industry using the business model of platform-as-a-service. The company has been established in the year 2020 In payment industry veterans PayRow having an inspiring experience to extent in market.
PayRow drives its services for each region (Middle East - Africa - South Asia) from ideation stage to the final revenue output. By offering company's - hardware and software are targeted either towards payment service providers or end merchants and business owners. For joining journey send interest to info@PayRow.ae

PayRow Support Value Added Tax which is a tax on goods and services that is levied at every stage of the supply chain. • At each stage, a certain value (a small amount of the total tax) is added from the point of production to sales. 

• We help companies obtain an extensive list of audit firms and create a more transparent and competitive environment for audit firms to provide the best services. PayRow digital payment methods are faster, safer, easier to collect, and less expensive for businesses. PayRow features:

• Complete flexibility in payment. 
• Revolutionary Pricing. 
• Get Paid Faster. 
• Secure Payment and Point-Of-Sale Integration. 
• Remote Terminal Management 
• Lower Operational Costs. 
• Access to Premium Payment Services. The Wage Protection System (WPS) is an electronic salary transfer system that allows organizations to pay wages. • The business owner must open a bank account with a bank or an authorized agent if he does not already have a bank account. 

• The employer must sign an agreement with PayRow or with the agent to issue a PayRow card for salary collection. The employer can also issue instructions for salary transfer. PayRow benefits give consumers access to goods they might otherwise not be able to afford. PayRow easier access to credit. also, provides some perks, particularly in the context of not being overburdened with debt that service providers should be careful to avoid. 

 The company also provides low-interest rates for using the service and a very comfortable installment period. For people, PayRow prepaid card allows you to shop online for goods and services, even if you don't have a checking account with a bank. This allows you to shop in the comfort of your home because you are limited to the amount on your card. 

 For Merchants, you can load money onto your card, by having the customer pay directly through the payment channels listed on PayRow Application. 

 Prepaid cards contain the account number, which makes it possible to directly deposit the value of purchases. PayRow brings automation to life, transforming operational efficiency and elevating daily customer experiences. We streamline complete and connected solutions with unparalleled development, manufacturing, and support. • Lightweight, sturdy, and durable 

• Stable And Reliable Performance with Android 

• Multiple Payment Options with QR code 

• Face recognition payment are supported 

• Built-in thermal printer with high efficiency 

• Easy installation and maintenance 

• PCI Certified Application PayRow smart POS terminal supports all payment channels covering mobile payment methods such as NFC Payment, Apple Pay, Samsung Pay, Alipay, WeChat Pay, and Quick Pass. 

• NFC Supports Type A&B card Mifare card 

• ISO/ICE 14443 and ISO15693 compliant 

• Memory2GB RAM + 16GB 

• Display 5.99"HD+, 1440*720 

• Non-removable lithium polymer battery; 7.6V/2580mAh 

• built-in 58mm thermal Print speed: 70mm/s 

• Paper roll: Φ40mm Turn your smartphone or tablet into a powerful POS. Manage sales, inventory and employees with ease; engage customers and increase your revenue. Whether you have single or multiple stores, our tools help run your business. 

• Android device with memory,easy to make secondary development 

• Compatible with multinational fiscal control module legal standards 

• Dual-screen with customer display to bring more user-friendly 

• Multifunctional interfaces help connect to the cash drawer 

• Barcode scanner, printer, and keyboard. 

• Multiple payment options with Contactless cards, chip cards 

• Face recognition make payments more convenient and efficient A built-in backup battery is optional 

• PCI Certified Application Customer Identification and Verification 

The main benefit of using PayRow eKYC is that it eliminates the need to carry around multiple pieces of identification and can speed up transactions. • Customers with active digital accounts can also use the app to verify their identity in a few simple steps. 

• Safe and secure method to share confidential information. Easier compliance with the regulator's requirements. Instant verification against fraud. 

• Information and personal details are relayed timely and efficiently. Ease of access in facilitating the KYC process. DECLINE Payment Decline Card Declined Transaction Failed You have made Refund successfully You have made void successfully Pay By SMS Ok Please select app Processing Tap your card or insert Confirm card number Confirm certificate information Please input correct cost amount Payment Summary This is 3% of the order total before discount 
and is capped at AED 1 with a minimum of AED 
0.25 this fee support go green transformation PayRow SoftPOS is the ideal solution for accepting contactless payments directly on users smartphones, without any other devices. • All you need is a mobile device that allows users to use a mobile device instead of a cash register or POS machine to accept bank cards and QR codes. 

• You will need to log in to the app, enter the transaction amount and confirm it.The cardholder can then hold the credit or debit card or mobile wallet (Apple Pay, Google Pay, Samsung Pay)against the back of the phone until the transaction is complete. Payrow QRCodes are cheaper and simpler for both buyers and merchants. • Acquisitions benefit from lower operating costs because they do not need to deploy a point of sale(POS) for each moment. 

• Only Requires a camera phone and QR code reader software installed to scan a QR code image. PayRow Pay By Link is a simple and useful tool to let customers pay through a secure link through credit and debit cards. • you can Send payment link invoices by email and reduce time chasing unpaid ones with unique payment links that let you keep track of each payment request. 

• That it gives customers a safe and convenient way to pay an invoice online, using a credit card, debit card, or other forms of electronic payment.
